cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1687

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1688

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1690

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1692

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1693

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1694

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1695

description: Mozilla Firefox before 22.0 does not properly enforce the X-Frame-Options protection mechanism, which allows remote attackers to conduct clickjacking attacks via a crafted web site that uses the HTTP server push feature with multipart responses.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1696

description: The XrayWrapper implementation in Mozilla Firefox before 22.0, Firefox ESR 17.x before 17.0.7, Thunderbird before 17.0.7, and Thunderbird ESR 17.x before 17.0.7 does not properly restrict use of DefaultValue for method calls, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript code with chrome privileges via a crafted web site that triggers use of a user-defined (1) toString or (2) valueOf method.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1697

description: The getUserMedia permission implementation in Mozilla Firefox before 22.0 references the URL of a top-level document instead of the URL of a specific page, which makes it easier for remote attackers to trick users into permitting camera or microphone access via a crafted web site that uses IFRAME elements.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1698

description: The Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) display algorithm in Mozilla Firefox before 22.0 does not properly handle the .com, .name, and .net top-level domains, which allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar via unspecified homograph characters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1699

description: The Mozilla Maintenance Service in Mozilla Firefox before 22.0 on Windows does not properly handle inability to launch the Mozilla Updater executable file, which allows local users to gain privileges via vectors involving placement of a Trojan horse executable file at an arbitrary location.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1700

description: mod_rewrite.c in the mod_rewrite module in the Apache HTTP Server 2.2.x before 2.2.25 writes data to a log file without sanitizing non-printable characters, which might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via an HTTP request containing an escape sequence for a terminal emulator.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1862

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Zero Point theme 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.9 for Drupal allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1905

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Rules module 7.x-2.x before 7.x-2.3 for Drupal allows remote authenticated users with the "administer rules" permission to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a rule tag.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1906

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the tg3_read_vpd function in drivers/net/ethernet/broadcom/tg3.c in the Linux kernel before 3.8.6 allows physically proximate attackers to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted firmware that specifies a long string in the Vital Product Data (VPD) data structure.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1929

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the MP3 Player module for Drupal 6.x allows remote authenticated users with certain permissions to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the file name of a MP3 file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1971

description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the elFinder file manager module 6.x-0.x before 6.x-0.8 and 7.x-0.x before 7.x-0.8 for Drupal allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of unspecified victims to create, modify, or delete files via unknown vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-1972

description: Multiple integer overflows in X.org libX11 1.5.99.901 (1.6 RC1) and earlier allow X servers to trigger allocation of insufficient memory and a buffer overflow via vectors related to the (1) XQueryFont, (2) _XF86BigfontQueryFont, (3) XListFontsWithInfo, (4) XGetMotionEvents, (5) XListHosts, (6) XGetModifierMapping, (7) XGetPointerMapping, (8) XGetKeyboardMapping, (9) XGetWindowProperty, (10) XGetImage, (11) LoadColornameDB, (12) XrmGetFileDatabase, (13) _XimParseStringFile, or (14) TransFileName functions.
